function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The spread of infectious disease through the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread illness and transmission of infection","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, vaccination campaigns, and building design that promotes natural airflow and ventilation","Technologies":"Air purification systems, antimicrobial surfaces, and smart building management systems","People":"Residents, workers, and visitors in urban and suburban areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, building designers, and facility managers"}]}
